宋体;color:#333333;background:#EEEEEE;mso-font-kerning:0pt">运行程序，输入<span lang="EN-US"> #</span>，结果为：</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;color:#333333;mso-font-kerning:
0pt"><br>
<span style="background:#EEEEEE">c='#'</span><br>
<br>
</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
宋体;color:#333333;background:#EEEEEE;mso-font-kerning:0pt">大家亲自运行程序会发现，<span lang="EN-US">getch() </span>和 <span lang="EN-US">getche() </span>类似，输入一个字符就立即获取，不会等待用户按下回车键。与<span lang="EN-US"> getche() </span>不同的是，<span lang="EN-US">getch() </span>输入的<span lang="EN-US"> # </span>并没有显示出来。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;
font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;color:#333333;mso-font-kerning:
0pt"><br>
<br>
</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
宋体;color:#333333;background:#EEEEEE;mso-font-kerning:0pt">在<span lang="EN-US">C</span>语言中，将用户输入的内容显示在屏幕上叫做</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
宋体;color:green;background:#EEEEEE;mso-font-kerning:0pt">回显（<span lang="EN-US">Echo</span>）</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
宋体;color:#333333;background:#EEEEEE;mso-font-kerning:0pt">。<span lang="EN-US">getchar()</span>、<span lang="EN-US">getche() </span>是有回显的，而<span lang="EN-US"> getch() </span>没有回显。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
宋体;color:#333333;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><br>
<br>
</span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
宋体;color:#333333;background:#EEEEEE;mso-font-kerning:0pt">回显在大部分情况下是有必要的，它能够与用户及时交互，让用户清楚地看到自己输入的内容。但在某些特殊情况下，我们却不希望有回显，例如输入密码，有回显是非常危险的，容易被偷窥。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;
mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="background-color: rgb(249, 249, 249); background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial;"><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;color:#6E6E6E;mso-font-kerning:0pt">从本质上讲，<span lang="EN-US">getch()</span>、<span lang="EN-US">getche() </span>立即回显是因为它们不带缓冲区，而<span lang="EN-US"> getchar() </span>带有缓冲区，必须等待用户按下回车键才能确认输入结束，更多内容将在《</span><span lang="EN-US"><a href="http://c.biancheng.net/cpp/html/2414.html" target="_blank"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
宋体;color:#0088CC;border:none windowtext 1.0pt;mso-border-alt:none windowtext 0cm;
padding:0cm;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><span lang="EN-US">结合C</span></span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
宋体;color:#0088CC;border:none windowtext 1.0pt;mso-border-alt:none windowtext 0cm;
padding:0cm;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><span lang="EN-US">语言缓冲区谈getchar()</span></span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
宋体;color:#0088CC;border:none windowtext 1.0pt;mso-border-alt:none windowtext 0cm;
padding:0cm;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><span lang="EN-US">、getche()</span></span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
